mapper.insert:
insert into `fanli`.`almm_pre_order` (auctionId,auctionNum,auctionTitle,createTime,discountAndSubsidyToString,earningTime, exNickName,exShopTitle,feeString,finalDiscountToString,payPrice,payStatus,realPayFee,realPayFeeString, shareRate,taobaoTradeParentId,terminalType,tkBizTag,tkPubShareFeeString,tkShareRate, tkShareRateToString,finalDiscountFeeString,category,siteid,adzoneid) values
(#{td.auctionId}, #{td.auctionNum}, #{td.auctionTitle}, #{td.createTime}, #{td.discountAndSubsidyToString}, #{td.earningTime}, #{td.exNickName}, #{td.exShopTitle}, #{td.feeString}, #{td.finalDiscountToString}, #{td.payPrice}, case #{td.payStatus} when '订单付款' then 12 when '订单结算' then 3 when '订单失效' then 13 else #{td.payStatus} end , #{td.realPayFee}, #{td.realPayFeeString}, #{td.shareRate}, #{td.taobaoTradeParentId}, #{td.terminalType}, case #{td.tkBizTag} when '淘宝' then 1 when '天猫' then 2 when '聚划算' then 3 when '天猫国际' then 4 else 0 end , #{td.tkPubShareFeeString}, #{td.tkShareRate}, #{td.tkShareRateToString}, #{td.finalDiscountFeeString}, #{td.category}, #{td.siteid}, #{td.adzoneid})
mapper.select: select a.* from `fanli`.`almm_pre_order` a LEFT JOIN (select * from `fanli`.`almm_order` where createTime > date_add(now(), interval -2 month)) b on a.taobaoTradeParentId = b.taobaoTradeParentId where b.taobaoTradeParentId is null
select taobaoTradeParentId as order_id ,user_id from `fanli`.`almm_pre_order` a LEFT JOIN `fanli`.`almm_adzone` b on a.adzoneid = b.adzone_id where user_id is not null
select * from `fanli`.`almm_user` where `status` = '2'
mapper.insert: replace into `fanli`.`user_order_tb` (user_id,order_id,time) values ((select user_id from almm_adzone where adzone_id = #{adzone_id}) ,#{order_id},now())
mapper.select:
SELECT user_id,createTime,earningTime,concat(taobaoTradeParentId,'') taobaoTradeParentId,exShopTitle,payStatus, auctionTitle,auctionNum,totalAlipayFeeString,feeString,realPayFeeString, finalfee,tkPubShareFeeString,tb_service_fee,service_fee,tax_fee,share_fee from `fanli`.`user_order_tb` a LEFT JOIN `fanli`.`almm_order` b on a.order_id = b.taobaoTradeParentId and user_id = ${user_id} where payStatus in ('3','12','13' )
and ( earningTime >= '${startDate}' and earningTime <= '${endDate}' )
and ( createTime >= '${startDate}' and createTime <= '${endDate}' )
and( auctionTitle like '%${params}%' or taobaoTradeParentId = '${params}' or exShopTitle like '%${params}%')
and payStatus = '${payStatus}'
order by earningTime desc
order by createTime desc
limit ${ofset},${pageSize}

SELECT user_id,total_amt,balance,draw_money,time FROM `fanli`.`user_amt_tb` WHERE 1=1
AND user_id = '${user_id}'

SELECT if(SUM(money) is null,0.0,SUM(money)) as total_task_money FROM `fanli`.`finance_trade` WHERE type = '3'
AND user_id = '${user_id}'

SELECT user_id,alipay_user_name,real_name,save_time,run_status FROM `fanli`.`alipay_info` WHERE 1=1
AND user_id = '${user_id}'

select if(SUM(feeString) is null,0.0,SUM(feeString)) as unused from `fanli`.`user_order_tb` a LEFT JOIN `fanli`.`almm_order` b on a.order_id = b.taobaoTradeParentId where b.earningTime > ${downLimit} and a.user_id = ${user_id} and payStatus in ('3','12')

select user_id,createTime,earningTime,concat(taobaoTradeParentId,'') taobaoTradeParentId,exShopTitle,payStatus, auctionTitle,auctionNum,totalAlipayFeeString,feeString as unused,realPayFeeString, finalfee,tkPubShareFeeString,tb_service_fee,service_fee,tax_fee,share_fee from `fanli`.`user_order_tb` a LEFT JOIN `fanli`.`almm_order` b on a.order_id = b.taobaoTradeParentId where b.earningTime > ${downLimit} and a.user_id = ${user_id} and payStatus in ('3','12')
limit ${ofset},${pageSize}

SELECT user_id,createTime,earningTime,concat(taobaoTradeParentId,'') taobaoTradeParentId,exShopTitle,payStatus, auctionTitle,auctionNum,totalAlipayFeeString,feeString,realPayFeeString, finalfee,tkPubShareFeeString,tb_service_fee,service_fee,tax_fee,share_fee from `fanli`.`user_order_tb` a LEFT JOIN `fanli`.`almm_order` b on a.order_id = b.taobaoTradeParentId where payStatus in ('4','3','12','13') and a.trade_id = 808 order by createTime desc

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `fanli`.`user_relation` ( user_id, fuid, ctime, lose_time ) VALUES ( (select user_id from `fanli`.`user_info` where wx_id = #{openid}), #{fuid}, NOW(), date_add(now(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR) )
mapper.select:
SELECT a.user_id, a.fuid, a.ctime, a.lose_time, if(b.user_nick is null or b.user_nick = '',CONCAT('用户',a.user_id),CONCAT(SUBSTR(b.user_nick , 1 , 1),'*****')) user_nick FROM `fanli`.`user_relation` a LEFT JOIN `fanli`.`user_info` b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.fuid = #{user_id}
limit ${ofset},${pageSize}

SELECT b.user_id buy_user_id, a.fuid, CONCAT(SUBSTR(c.auctionTitle , 1 , 1),'***************') auctionTitle, c.tkPubShareFeeString*0.2 as tkPubShareFeeString, c.* FROM `fanli`.`user_relation` a LEFT JOIN `fanli`.`user_order_tb` b ON b.user_id = a.user_id INNER JOIN `fanli`.`almm_order` c ON b.order_id = c.taobaoTradeParentId WHERE a.fuid = #{user_id} and a.user_id = #{child_id}
limit ${ofset},${pageSize}

SELECT a.user_id, a.item_id, a.item_name, CONCAT( 'https://item.taobao.com/item.htm?id=', item_id ) item_url, count(b.id) click_count FROM `fanli`.`ad_tb` a LEFT JOIN `fanli`.`user_share_log` b ON a.user_id = b.share_user_id and a.item_id = b.itemid WHERE a.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY a.user_id,a.item_id,a.item_name
limit ${ofset},${pageSize}
select count(1) from `fanli`.`adzone_white_list` where user_id = #{user_id}

select site_id,member_id from ( select concat(a.site_id,'') as site_id,a.member_id,a.is_full,if (b.ad_count is null ,0,b.ad_count) ad_count from `fanli`.`almm_site` a LEFT JOIN ( select site_id,count(adzone_id) ad_count from almm_adzone GROUP BY site_id ) b on a.site_id = b.site_id ) c where c.is_full = '0' ORDER BY ad_count limit 0,1
select login_cookie as cookie from `fanli`.`almm_user` where memberid = #{member_id} and `status` = '2'
select user_id from `fanli`.`user_info` where user_id not in (select user_id from `fanli`.`almm_adzone`)

SELECT memberid as member_id, IF (site_count IS NULL,0,site_count) AS site_count, login_cookie as cookie FROM `fanli`.`almm_user` b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT member_id, count(site_id) site_count FROM `fanli`.`almm_site` GROUP BY member_id ) a ON a.member_id = b.memberid where b.`status` = '2' ORDER BY site_count ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT adzone_id,site_id,pid from almm_adzone where user_id = #{user_id}

select * from `fanli`.`channel_info`
channel_id = #{channel_id}

SELECT z.user_id AS user_id, `a`.sumorder, `hongbao`.*, `user_amt_tb`.*, #z.id AS task_id, z.money, #z.type, (IF(sumorder IS NULL, 0, sumorder) + IF(hongbao IS NULL, 0, hongbao)-total_amt) AS valid_money1, balance+draw_money+money-total_amt AS valid_money2 FROM (SELECT SUM(money) AS money, user_id FROM `finance_trade` WHERE TYPE = '3' GROUP BY user_id) z LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(`tb1`.`finalfee`) sumorder, `tb2`.`user_id` FROM (SELECT `taobaoTradeParentId`, `finalfee` FROM `fanli`.`almm_order` WHERE `earningTime` < ${earningTime} and `earningTime` IS NOT NULL) AS `tb1` JOIN `user_order_tb` AS `tb2` ON `tb1`.`taobaoTradeParentId` = `tb2`.`order_id` GROUP BY `tb2`.`user_id`) AS a ON `a`.`user_id` = z.user_id LEFT JOIN `user_amt_tb` ON `z`.`user_id` = `user_amt_tb`.`user_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT `user_id`, SUM(`money`) hongbao FROM `finance_trade` WHERE `type` IN('6','2') GROUP BY `user_id`) AS `hongbao` ON `z`.`user_id` = `hongbao`.`user_id`
